name: Gurtle the Turtle
description:
STORY:

So there is this turtle called Gurtle who is hungry and needs to eat but she's also like time-traveling and hibernating and stuff so she has to eat without waking herself up so she has to be careful not to make too much noise because then she would wake herself up but unfortunately her fridge is super noisy and always makes noise when she opens it up and the noise keeps getting noisier so she has to quickly get all the ingredients out of the fridge before the fridge wakes her up you have to play for yourself the story is very good and I don't want to give away too much.

CONTROLS:

Click your mouse (NOT your turtle) to do stuff.

CREDITS:

Game Designer, Visual Artist, Voice Talent, Foley Artist, Pro Coder: Girlfriend
Game Designer, Voice Talent, Contra Coder: Me
Special Guest Voice Talents: Fridge, Spoon 1, Spoon 2, Glass, Ballpoint Pen, Breadbox, Table, Scissors
